source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain.

generated_critique: The caption should also mention that several cars drive quickly past the storm in the foreground, which is not visible in the video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a dramatic time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell storm cloud at night. Internal lightning illuminates the stacked, saucer-like structure from within, causing it to glow with an eerie purple and white light. The storm appears to hover over a dark landscape as it evolves and unleashes a curtain of rain. In the foreground, several cars drive quickly past, adding a sense of urgency and scale to the scene.
